title: Champions still not fixed; meta is still all over the place
body:
So......assassin's are still broken (ie Talon's W gets a larger hit box when blades are going back to him doesn't make any sense to me), adc's still not upgraded to the new "meta" (not even sure if there is one lol), and the fact that there are so many bannable champs now but we still only get 6 bans total is looking like this game is taking a really bad turn.

Please, tell me I'm wrong.
